## Runtime.ResourceTree.ReadOnlyResourceTreeLeaf.(constructor)

Creates a new leaf node. Use the static create method instead.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected constructor(name: ResourceName, parentPath: ResourceId | undefined, resource: T);
```
